RESOURCE.NAME: HITEx Text Tokenizer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Adds tokens and space tokens to the document

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to analyze

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of file containing the tokenization rules

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list of tokenization rules

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to analyze

RESOURCE.NAME: HITEx Sectionizer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Adds section annotations to the document

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to add annotations to

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: headersURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of file containing section header definitions

PARAMETER.NAME: headersList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The List of serialized header definitions. If specified, this parameter takes precedence over headersURL.

RESOURCE.NAME: HITEx Part-of-Speech Tagger
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Adds part-of-speech annotations to the document

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to analyse

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: lexiconURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of the file containing lexicon

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of the file containing tagging rules

PARAMETER.NAME: lexiconList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The lexicon list

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list tagging rules

RESOURCE.NAME: HITEx Noun Phrase Splitter
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Adds noun phrase annotations to the document

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to analyse

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: dictionaryURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of file containing the POS tag dictionary

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of file containing chunking rules

PARAMETER.NAME: dictionaryList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list containing POS tag dictionary

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list containing chunking rules

RESOURCE.NAME: HITEx RegEx Concept Finder
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Adds the concepts matching the regular expressions to the document

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to analyse

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: filterURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of the file containing the list of section selection criteria sorted in decreasing section importance order.

PARAMETER.NAME: filterText
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The string representing section filter expressions, devided by new line characters (\r, \n or \r\n). The list is sorted in decreasing section importance order. If specified, this parameter takes precedence over the filterURL.

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of file containing the list of regular expressions

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesXML
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The XML strng representing the rules. If specified, this parameter takes precedence over the rulesURL.

PARAMETER.NAME: useSections
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that turns on/off section filtering.

RESOURCE.NAME: HITEx Smoking Status Finder
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Adds smoking status to sentence annotations using smoking classification model

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to analyse

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: useSections
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that enables / disables section filtering

PARAMETER.NAME: sectionFilterURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of section filtering rules file

PARAMETER.NAME: sentenceFilterURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of sentence filtering rules file

PARAMETER.NAME: sectionFilterText
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The serialized section filtering rules

PARAMETER.NAME: sentenceFilterList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list of serialized sentence filtering rules

PARAMETER.NAME: smokerNonSmokerAttributesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of ARFF attribute file (see WEKA documentation)

PARAMETER.NAME: pastCurrentSmokerAttributesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of ARFF attribute file (see WEKA documentation)

PARAMETER.NAME: smokerNonSmokerModelURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of binary file containing WEKA smoking classification model

PARAMETER.NAME: pastCurrentSmokerModelURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of binary file containing WEKA smoking classification model

RESOURCE.NAME: HITEx UMLS Concept Finder
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Adds UMLS concepts to the document

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to analyse

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: filterMappings
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that turns on and off the filtering of term to CUI mappings

PARAMETER.NAME: filterHostname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The hostname of the machine containing the filter database table

PARAMETER.NAME: filterPort
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The port on the machine containing the filter database table

PARAMETER.NAME: filterDbname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The database name of the UMLS filter

PARAMETER.NAME: filterUsername
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The username to access the machine containing the filter database table

PARAMETER.NAME: filterPassword
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The password to access the machine containing the filter database table

PARAMETER.NAME: filterTable
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The filter table name

PARAMETER.NAME: filterSemanticTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that turns on and off the semantic type filtering

PARAMETER.NAME: semanticTypesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of file containing the semantic types of interest

PARAMETER.NAME: semanticTypesList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list containing the semantic types of interest

PARAMETER.NAME: filterSections
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that turns on and off the filtering of sections

PARAMETER.NAME: sectionCriteriaURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of file containing the section selection criteria expressions

PARAMETER.NAME: sectionCriteriaList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list containing the section selection criteria expressions

PARAMETER.NAME: umlsHostname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The hostname of the machine running the UMLS database server

PARAMETER.NAME: umlsPort
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The port on the machine running the UMLS database server

PARAMETER.NAME: umlsDatabaseName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The database name of the UMLS database

PARAMETER.NAME: umlsUsername
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The username to access the machine running the UMLS database server

PARAMETER.NAME: umlsPassword
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The password to access the machine running the UMLS database server

PARAMETER.NAME: stop
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that turns on and off the UMLS stop words feature when mapping terms to the UMLS concepts

PARAMETER.NAME: stem
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that defines whether stemming will be used when mapping terms to the UMLS concepts. The allowed values are: true, false

PARAMETER.NAME: truncate
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that turns on and off the truncate feature when mapping terms to the UMLS concepts

PARAMETER.NAME: suppress
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Sets the level of suppression when mapping terms to the UMLS concepts

PARAMETER.NAME: cacheSize
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The size of the cache to be used by the UMLS mapper. Anything less than or equal to 0 will disable cache

PARAMETER.NAME: calcRelevanceScore
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that turns on and off the (potentially time-consuming) UMLS concept relevance score calculation to enable disambiguation of concepts

PARAMETER.NAME: useCustomSemanticTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that turns on and off use of the custom semantic types rather than UMLS semantic types

RESOURCE.NAME: HITEx NegEx-based Negation Modifier Finder for UMLS Concepts
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Adds the negation status to UMLS concepts in the document

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to analyse

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of the file containing the list of negation rules

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The inline list of negation rules. If specified, takes precedence over the rulesURL

PARAMETER.NAME: filterSemanticTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that turns on and off the semantic type filtering

PARAMETER.NAME: semanticTypesList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list containing the semantic types of interest

PARAMETER.NAME: filterSections
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that turns on and off the filtering of sections

PARAMETER.NAME: sectionCriteriaList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list containing the section selection criteria expressions

RESOURCE.NAME: HITEx Temporal Modifier Finder for UMLS Concepts
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Assigns temporal information to UMLS concepts

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to analyse

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: temporalPatternsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of the temporal regular expression search patterns

PARAMETER.NAME: temporalWordsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of the temporal words to search for

PARAMETER.NAME: temporalRulesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of the temporal rules

PARAMETER.NAME: temporalPatternsList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list of temporal regular expression search patterns

PARAMETER.NAME: temporalWordsList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list of temporal words to search for

PARAMETER.NAME: temporalRulesList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list of temporal rules

PARAMETER.NAME: attributeFileURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of the ARFF file containing sentence classification attributes to support sentence classification as either plan/future or fact

PARAMETER.NAME: modelFileURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of the classification model file to support sentence classification as either plan/future or fact

PARAMETER.NAME: detectPlan
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that turns on and off the plan/future detection

PARAMETER.NAME: stopwordsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL of the file containing stopwords to support sentence classification as either plan/future or fact

PARAMETER.NAME: stopwordsList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list of stopwords

PARAMETER.NAME: filterSemanticTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that turns on and off the semantic type filtering

PARAMETER.NAME: semanticTypesList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list containing the semantic types of interest

PARAMETER.NAME: filterSections
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The flag that turns on and off the filtering of sections

PARAMETER.NAME: sectionCriteriaList
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The list containing the section selection criteria expressions

RESOURCE.NAME: HITEx MDD Responder Status Finder
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Detects MDD status in medical records

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to analyze

RESOURCE.NAME: HITEx Concept Viewer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Prints identified concepts to the screen

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASname
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: conceptTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Comma-separated list of concept types to be printed out, or null or empty string, if all types are to be printed out.

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to analyze
